name: stickerboards
description: Stickerboards monorepo (API + Web) with shared tooling and documentation

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n api,web -c auto "npm -w apps/api run dev" "npm -w apps/web run dev"
scripts.test:all: npm -w apps/api run test && npm -w apps/web run test
